views.frontend

Class CoverflowList

  • java.lang.Object
    • javafx.scene.Node
      • javafx.scene.Parent
        • javafx.scene.Group
          • views.frontend.CoverflowList
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    javafx.css.Styleable, javafx.event.EventTarget

    public class CoverflowList
extends javafx.scene.Group
    Horizontal list that displays CoverflowItem objects.
    Author:
    Thomas Debouverie

      • scrollToItemAtIndexAnimated

        public void scrollToItemAtIndexAnimated(int index,
                                        boolean animated)
        Centers item at given index.
        Parameters:
        index - Index of item to center
        animated - If true, the move to centering the item will be animated

      • moveToVerticalPositionAndFocusedMode

        public void moveToVerticalPositionAndFocusedMode(double verticalPosition,
                                                 boolean focusedMode,
                                                 boolean animated)
        Moves the list vertically and changes its "focused" mode.
        Parameters:
        verticalPosition - Vertical position in its parent where the list must move
        focusedMode - If true, all items will be full opacity and with reflection. If false, opacity will be redued and reflection removed.
        animated - If true, the move will be animated
